meanings.definition: A person's position or rank compared with others.
examples: His status went up when he got that fancy job.

meanings.definition: Easily moved to feel; tending to experience emotion.
examples: They were an emotional family that often cried during the sad parts of movies.

images.description: One person showing many different emotions.
images.caption: Each person can feel many different emotions

meanings.definition: On the other hand; by contrast.
examples: We thought he would be grateful. However, he was offended, instead.
The group of close friends supported each other as they went through the problems of growing up.

images.alt: Photo of someone holding a small child's hand.
images.description: Someone helping a small child balance by holding their hand.
images.caption: Holding hands supports the small child to balance on the log.

meanings.definition: Related to the body, not the mind; involving bodily contact.
examples: He did hard physical training to prepare for the race.

images.alt: Photo of young man exercising on stairs.
images.description: Photo of young man getting exercise on stairs.
images.caption: Stretching is a way to get into good physical shape.

source.title: Young ethnic focused sportsman exercising on stairs in city
source.author: Andrea Piacquadio
